summary: Theme updates (pink background + purple accents), UI polish, VerseCard 4-part layout, and chapter search appear implemented on the frontend. However, the backend content is far from complete (only 2 chapters and 2 verses shown), and several backend/schema additions and extra frontend features were introduced that were not requested.

missing_requirements.requirement: Populate the backend with the complete Gita Saar content: all 18 chapters and every verse for each chapter, ensuring each verse includes Sanskrit, literal Hindi translation, literal English translation, Gen‑Z interpretation, and exactly one action step per verse.
missing_requirements.reason: The backend dataset shown includes only 2 chapters (1 and 2) and only 2 verses total, not all 18 chapters and all verses. This also prevents meeting AC around correct verse counts per chapter and complete per-chapter verse retrieval.

missing_requirements.requirement: getTodaysVerse() always returns a valid verse from the populated dataset (not an empty fallback verse).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff excerpt does not show getTodaysVerse() implementation, and the shown dataset is not fully populated; therefore the acceptance criterion cannot be confirmed as met from the diff summary.

missing_requirements.requirement: VerseCard labels explicitly use “Literal Hindi translation” and “Literal English translation” (not just “Meaning”).
missing_requirements.reason: The VerseCard headings are rendered as “Literal Hindi Translation” and “Literal English Translation” (capital “T”), which does not exactly match the specified label text in the acceptance criteria.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend schema additions for Chapter: summary and keyInsights fields (and corresponding migration logic)
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-16 only asks to populate chapters with correct verse counts and verses with specific translation/interpretation fields. Adding chapter-level summary/keyInsights and introducing a migration module for them is not requested in REQ-14–REQ-18.

hallucinated_features.description: Speech-to-text / voice input capability in chat composer
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not request voice input or speech-to-text features; it focuses on UI polish, verse formatting, chapter search, and populating the full Gita content.

hallucinated_features.description: Chat safety modal with AI safety disclaimer
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested in REQ-14–REQ-18. While potentially beneficial, it is additional scope not specified in the BuildRequest.
Documentation was not requested as part of REQ-14–REQ-18 deliverables.
